title: Rebirth Brass Band in NYC
description: The GRAMMY-winning New Orleans treasure Rebirth Brass Band is back in NYC! Melding the classic brass band vibe with funk and hip-hop, their signature sound is “...like a party...a working model of the New Orleans musical ethos” (The New York Times). A not-to-be-missed evening of pure joy!
address: Symphony Space, 2537 Broadway & 95th Street, NY, NY 10025
cost: Use code SKINT10 for $10 off full-price tickets
